name: Happy Loops
description:
Happy loops is a fun and addictive racing game where you compete against others to flip your way to victory.
Tap and hold to accelerate and flip round the course to claim the top spot.
With many levels to unlock and play you'll always be coming back for more!

Happy Loops features:
- Simple and easy to learn gameplay
- Fast paced racing
- Compete against others
- Fun levels to unlock
